content:
# The new furnace is currently processing 3 units of iron ore, and my inventory has been updated to:
# - 5 coal
# - 5 stone
# - 3 iron ore
# - 2 iron plates
# - 5 iron gear wheels

# To ensure that the smelting process continues smoothly, I will monitor the furnace for the next 30 seconds to see how many iron plates are produced from the remaining iron ore.

# Monitoring the furnace for the next 30 seconds.
for _ in range(30):
    if inspect_inventory(new_furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate] > 2:  # Check if more iron plates have been produced
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# After waiting, I will extract all the iron plates produced from the new furnace.
crafted_plates = extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, new_furnace.position, quantity=3)  # Extract produced iron plates
print(f"Extracted Iron Plates from new furnace: {crafted_plates}")
print(f"Final Furnace status: {inspect_inventory(new_furnace)}")  # Check the furnace status after extraction
print(f"Final Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Confirm total iron plates in the inventory after extraction
